original_text:
For then you would number my steps;
    you would not keep watch over my sin;
korean_text: 그러하온데 이제 주께서 나의 걸음을 세시오니 나의 죄를 감찰하지 아니하시나이까

sentences.original_text: For then you would number my steps;
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 나의 걸음을 세실 것입니다;

sentences.original_text: you would not keep watch over my sin;
